author: Burnacid
install_msg:
Blood on the Clocktower cog is installed
Start your games by using `[p]botc setup` to create your channels and roles. After that you need the `slash` cog loaded and you need to `[p]slash enablecog botc`
short: Toggle on or off admin permissions
description: Do you need to hide channels from admins for game purposes? This cog allows an admin to toggle off his admin permissions and toggle it back on.
